body.p: This action is not compatible with the WebAuthor in-browser editor.

You can use the New DITA Topic action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Content Generation category to ask the AI Positron to create a new DITA topic containing content expanded by the AI based on an initial idea expressed in plain text format.
Examples (paste the content from each code block below in the New DITA Topic prompt dialog):

dlentry.dt: Create a DITA XML topic for installing a fictional application

p.codeblock: Installing an application named Emerald on Mac OS using the DMG installer.

dlentry.dt: Create a DITA XML topic based on a short description

p.codeblock: Create an "Installation" DITA topic with 2 sections: "System requirements" and "Installation steps". Provide some minimum and recommended values for the system requirements. Use a 3-column table for the system resources, the columns being called Resource, Minimum and Recommended.
